detail_description.description: Provide a clear explanation of all studies and drawings used in the chart. Use plain text only, without markdown. Format the description as numbered points, separating studies and drawings. Each point should explain one item clearly and concisely in a single line. The format should be: '1. Explanation of first study or drawing. 2. Explanation of second study or drawing.' Do not group multiple concepts in one point. Keep total description under 1000 characters.

width.description: set chart image width in pixels

height.description: set chart image height in pixels

style.description: set chart style [bar, candle, line, area, heikinAshi, hollowCandle, baseline, hiLo, column]

range.description: set chart range [1D, 5D, 1M, 3M, 6M, 1Y, 5Y, ALL, DTD, WTD, MTD, YTD] override interavl or specify the range with an object with from and to

from.description: datetime for the x-axis range from eg. 2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z

to.description: datetime for the x-axis range to eg. 2023-02-01T00:00:00.000Z

lineStyle.priceSource.description: [open, high, low, close, hl2, hlc3, ohlc4]

areaStyle.priceSource.description: [open, high, low, close, hl2, hlc3, ohlc4]

baselineStyle.priceSource.description: baseline price source [open, high, low, close, hl2, hlc3, ohlc4]

columnStyle.priceSource.description: [open, high, low, close, hl2, hlc3, ohlc4]

priceRange.description: override the visible y-axis price range

from.description: price for the y-axis range from eg. 75.12

to.description: price for the y-axis range to eg. 99.99

margin.description: price margin space when only one is specified (Min: 0.001, Max: 0.1)

mainPaneHeight.description: override the main pane height (Min: 100, Max: 1800)

showLegend.description: show chart legend eg. Tesla, Inc. · 5 · Cboe BZX · ...

showMainPane.description: show main pane with the price chart

showPriceLine.description: show price line in the chart

showSeriesLastValue.description: show series last value in the label

showSeriesOHLC.description: show series OHLC value in the legend

showBarChange.description: show bar change value in the legend

showStudyPlotNamesAction.description: show study plot label eg. Histogram, MACD, Signal

showSymbolLabelsAction.description: show chart price label with the symbol eg. BTCUSDT

showSymbolWatermark.description: show symbol watermark eg. BTCUSDT, 1D Bitcoin / TetherUS

studies.description: set chart to include multiple study indicators
